Class Person

java.lang.Object
domain.Person
Direct Known Subclasses:
Admin, Member
public abstract class Person extends Object
An abstract base class representing a person in the library system.

The Person class serves as a common parent for all types of users in the system, such as Admin and Member. It contains shared attributes like ID, name, and password, along with common operations such as password verification.

  • Constructor Details

    • Person

      public Person()
      Default no-argument constructor. Initializes an empty Person instance.

    • Person

      public Person(String userName, String password)
      Constructs a new Person with the specified username and password.
      Parameters:
      userName - the username or email used for login
      password - the user's password

    • Person

      public Person(String id, String userName, String password)
      Constructs a new Person with an explicit ID, username, and password.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier for the person
      userName - the username or email used for login
      password - the password associated with the person

    • Person

      public Person(String userName, String password, String name, String id, String phone)
      Constructs a new user with basic information.
      Parameters:
      userName - the username or email used for login
      password - the user's password
      name - the full name of the user
      id - the unique identifier
      phone - the user's phone number

    • checkPassword

      public boolean checkPassword(String password)
      Verifies whether the provided password matches the stored one.
      Parameters:
      password - the password to verify
      Returns:
      true if the provided password matches the current password, false otherwise
